Articles.Content:
False.

The user below me just woke up.

Incorrect

The person below me has had multiple tabs of KSP forums open at once.

True. 5.

The person below me will say "False".

True

The user below me plays League of Legends.

FALSE. *snarls and beats you to death then hunts every other LoL player down and exterminates them for their heresy*

The user below me plays War Thunder

False.

The user below me is in college.

False.

The person below me is playing KSP as they go on the forums.

Your right! How did you know.

The user below me is a walrus.

Correct. I am a highly evolved walrus that can interact with the humans. Soon, we shall rule the world!

The user below the user below me that has a person above them will get confused by reading this.

Inconclusive answer.

The user below me snores.

False (I think).

The user below me just got done landing a new base on Laythe.

True, it's called Milliways.

The user below me has meet Micky Mouse.

True, when I was 9 at Disney World.

The user below me will use an even number of letters in his post.

False

The user below me owns a dog

False. Several chickens and cats, though.

The user below me is horrific at drawing.

False, but you missed "yes" by a couple level.

The next person is using Windows 7 or later.

True.

The user below me hates -10char.

True.

The user below me once played KSP for 24 hours nonstop.

True, I hate everyone equally. See also: Tsundere

[EDIT]: sniped again... No, not KSP, but Total War: Shogun 2 for 26 hours

The user below me is the very model of a modern major general

True, I am generally major.

The user below me is the genetic equivilent of GLaDOS.

(BUZZING)

That is... INCORRECT!

The next person have more posts in one day than the other on this thread.

EDIT: Ninja'd. But false still.

The next person... (see the sentence that starts with the same words)

I don't know what you mean, but I have made 190 posts in 3 days rather than 3 months with my eaten account. And I have 6 times the amount of rep

The user below me has more rep then they had before the catastrophe.

False, got three point on Bug Report Q&A on a problem off KSP 0.18.1 before the catastrophe, now I had probably 2.

The next person has a cat but is not a cat.

EDIT: To the first sentence, I have more than when I post this, which means I now have more before the catastrophe. (3 points before the Catastrophe, 2 points when I posted, and xx points now.)

Edited June 2, 2013 by Designer225

I am a cat.*Hiss*

The user below me is a dog.

I am a cat.

Meow.

The user below me has exploded and failed in KSP at least 250 times.
